mechanical_botany.ponder.insolator.heade: Growing Plants in the Mechanical Insolator
mechanical_botany.ponder.layered_compost: Transporting Rotational Power With Layered Composters
mechanical_botany.ponder.molten_compost_: Using Molten Liquid Compost Within a Mechanical Insolator
mechanical_botany.ponder.void_compost_us: Using Void Liquid Compost Within a Mechanical Insolator
mechanical_botany.ponder.compost_use.hea: Using Liquid Compost Within a Mechanical Insolator
mechanical_botany.ponder.insolator.text_: Mechanical Insolators will reprocess certain plants provided to them
They can be powered from the side using cogwheels
However, they require a fluid to be provided to them in order to process
This fluid is dependent on the plant, but typically will be Water
Throw or Insert plants at the top
After some time, the grown results can be retrieved via Right-click
The outputs can also be extracted by automation through any side
mechanical_botany.ponder.composter.text_: Mechanical Composter will turn compostables into Compost
They can be powered from the side using cogwheels
Throw or Insert compostables at the top
After some time, compost can be retrieved via Right-click
The outputs can also be extracted by automation through any side
mechanical_botany.ponder.layered_compost: Mechanical Composters can also be powered from the bottom
Rotational Power flows through the Mechanical Composter's cog
This offers for some unique automation potential
mechanical_botany.ponder.compost_creatio: Putting Compost into an Item Drain will provide small amounts of Liquid Compost
Mixing Liquid Compost and Lava together provides Molten Liquid Compost
mechanical_botany.ponder.molten_compost_: Wither Roses can be produced with the help of Molten Liquid Compost
mechanical_botany.ponder.void_compost_us: Chorus Fruit can be produced with the help of Void Liquid Compost
mechanical_botany.ponder.compost_use.tex: Plants gathered from Sniffers require Liquid Compost in order to be reprocessed
